creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: child reclining near a cannon dangling a long, thin object in PL hand and gazing upward; baby at L crawls over cannon balls near cannon
inscription:
Label

-- in graphite on verso: 2C3.10 | 173
-- label on back of mount: Carolyn Staley / Fine Prints / 2C3.10
provenance: [Carolyn Staley  Fine Prints, Seattle; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Two Naked Children Near a Gun
